replies.body:
Could be a few things.

1. A person deliberately throwing games to get to Bronze 5 then work there way out of it to prove how easy it is.
2. A different person now playing on the account

Consdering the average CS has gone from 3-4 per 10 mins to 8-9. Definitely a different person doing some preseason boosting.
Just my opinion.

Probably boosting a friends account so they dont get Bronze 5 next season after placements (but they will since the account owner is a Bronze 5 player)
Nope, most of the games they did pretty well in their scores.
